dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Puny mortal, why do you dare to cross my path?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no quarrel, I wish to pass in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? *chuckles* Your words amuse me. What do you offer in return for safe passage?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you knowledge of the arcane, a trade of information for passage.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge, you say? Interesting. Proceed, but do not think your feeble attempts at diplomacy impress me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I appreciate your tolerance. Farewell, spectre.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave my sight, insignificant being. Do not return unless you wish to face true darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll remember your generosity. Thank you, spectral guardian.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Remember, mortal, my generosity is fleeting. Begone before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can offer you an artifact of great power in exchange for passage.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An artifact? Show me this trinket of yours. If it pleases me, you may pass.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Here is the artifact, may it serve you well.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A trinket fit for a mortal. Leave now, before I change my mind about sparing you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll keep the artifact, but thank you for allowing me to pass.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Keep your token of mediocrity. Begone from my presence, I tire of your presence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have nothing to offer but my skills in battle. Let me through or face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, mortal. Show me what you're capable of, if you dare.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare yourself, spectre, for you face Eldryn Stormcaller!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, your bravado will be your downfall. Face the icy wrath of the Frostbound Spectre!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I retreat, I meant no harm. I'll find another way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pathetic. Flee while you can, coward. Cross my path again, and you won't escape.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here for pleasantries. Stand aside or face my wrath.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, arrogance. I shall enjoy extinguishing your flame, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Try your best, wraith, but you won't defeat me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery or foolishness? Let us find out, shall we? Prepare to embrace the cold embrace of the shadows!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see you are not one for reason. Let our blades speak for us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Reason is wasted on the likes of you. Tremble before the power of the Frostbound Spectre!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: As you wish, I'll leave you to your solitude.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise decision, mortal. Depart now, lest you tempt fate with your presence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come offering a truce. Let us put aside our differences and unite against a common enemy.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A truce? How amusing. And why should I trust the words of a pathetic creature like yourself?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Because together, we can achieve greatness. Trust me, ally with me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Greatness, you say? Perhaps there is merit in your words. Very well, mortal, I shall entertain this alliance... for now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You don't have to trust me, but working together benefits us both.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Trust is a luxury I do not afford. Very well, let this truce be a temporary convenience for us both.
